title: HoP 285 - Dominik Perler on Medieval Skepticism
itunes:title: HoP 285 - Dominik Perler on Medieval Skepticism
description: The medievals were too firm in their beliefs to entertain skeptical worries, right? Don't be so sure, as Peter learns from Dominik Perler.
